comment._content: As tagged by beachcomberaustralia, the same boat, the 'KARA', also appears in these photos in the Phillips collection: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3230393892 www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3230394794 www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3251829841
